ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Nutrient Paste Expanded: Connected Bed
ModMetaData.author: zed_0xff
ModMetaData.description:
Adds new hospital bed with integrated nutrient paste dripper.
Saves space, power and a bit of CPU cycles :)
- fully mimics vanilla Hospital Bed - requires research of Hospital Beds and Nutrient Paste (both vanilla) - stuffable - costs 110 metallic + 6 components - requires construction skill 10 to build - consumes 25 power (VNPE external dripper needs 50) - runs less code than original VNPE dripper - safe to add/remove mid-game
Sorry, no custom textures here (I've got trotter hands), just slightly greenish handles, like most VNPE things.
